modName: Sassy Teen Player Voice for PC Headtracking
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]This is a voicepack for PC Headtracking and Voice Type by HHaleyy, using voice clips from triptherift's Sassy Teens / Teenage Female Voice Type.

I will not be offering any further support for this, but it's super easy to modify yourself. Completely safe to install / uninstall, will not cause your game to implode. 

Uses mostly voice files from triptherift's Teenage Female Voice type resource, although I did modify some of the files myself using Audacity.  Based on vanilla resources, 110% lore friendly, all that good stuff.
[/size][size=3]
For extra immersion, I highly recommend running [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62068/?]Sarcastic Player Dialogue[/url] alongside this, for that extra bit of sass.[/size]

[color=#ea9999][font=Arial][size=4]Requirements:[/size][/font][/color]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72039/]PC Head Tracking and Voice Type by [b]HHaleyy[/b][/url][/size]

[b][color=#ea9999][size=4]Credits:[/size][/color][/b]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74444/]triptherift  (Teenage Female Voice Type) [/url][/size]

[b][color=#ea9999][size=4]Permissions:[/size][/color][/b]
[size=3]No rights reserved, do whatever you want with this as long as it's in line with the permissions given on triptherift's Teenage Female Voice Type page. [/size]
author: Lazuri

files.name: Sassy Teen Player Voice for PC Headtracking
